string.text: Play rendered cutscenes
Subtitles in cutscenes
Captioning in game
No subtitles
Subtitles (speech only)
Closed captions
Play
Movies
Recorded conversations
So you want the Zone to disappear...\nMAKE YOUR SECRET WISH COME TRUE ($$ACTION_USE$$)
You want to be rich...\nMAKE YOUR SECRET WISH COME TRUE ($$ACTION_USE$$)
Decided to rule the world...\nMAKE YOUR SECRET WISH COME TRUE ($$ACTION_USE$$)
Willing to destroy mankind...\nMAKE YOUR SECRET WISH COME TRUE ($$ACTION_USE$$)
You wish to be immortal...\nMAKE YOUR SECRET WISH COME TRUE ($$ACTION_USE$$)
To reveal the real mystery of the Zone...\nMAKE YOUR SECRET WISH COME TRUE ($$ACTION_USE$$)
S.T.A.L.K.E.R.
Press (Esc) to skip intro
Press (Esc) twice to continue
Cutscene skipped
Death truck
This one seems to be alive.
What a lucky guy...
At least death would have saved him from the dreams.
Let's go and see what value Sidorovich will put on your head.
What have you got?
A body. It came from the "death truck".
It's got... The Mark.
Well, you know the drill. Leave him on the...
This is a live one.
Bullshit! You're lying!
Let the Zone take me if I am.
Put it here!
(KILL THE STRELOK)
I think... for this one I can give you...
Rats
Strelok!
Strelok!
Sarcofag
Dream Doctor
If this is so important, why didn't you explain what you were going there for?
And where did... where did you get this photo from?
If you only knew where I've just been and what I saw!
One day you'll finish badly, Strelok.
Hold on, son. You're going to make it.
All is going to be right.
Where will you go now?
To... the North.
The Zone to disappear
I want the Zone to disappear...
Gold
I want... to be rich!
Rule the world
I want... to rule the world!
Humanity corrupt
Humanity is corrupt. Mankind must be controlled.
Immortality
I want... immortality!
Dream Doctor 2
I haven't seen Strelok in a long time.
Is he dead already?
Although he's hardy as a cat...
He should be OK I think.
Oh, well...
Well, let's leave this place, pal. Let's have some dinner.
I know that you're more interested in that than our old friend.
Peace
I don't know whether I was right or wrong.
I guess I'll never know.
But I made it.
And I guess I should be thankful for that.
Kill Gunslinger
Birds
Rats (Dark version)
Red Sky
Attention! You're approaching the secured perimeter of an ecological disaster zone! Illicit crossing of the perimeter is a criminal act!
Any attempt to penetrate the secured zone will be punished by any means necessary! Patrols have the right to shoot on sight!
The Zone poses mortal danger! We're here to protect you from the Zone, not the Zone from you. Do not jeopardize your life! Do not try to penetrate into the secured area!

The Security Service of Ukraine is calling all right minded and loyal citizens to collaborate with the authorities. Report all known cases of stalking! Do not let the looters hide behind your backs! They bring radioactive unidentified items from the Zone that are highly dangerous for human health and life. Only with your help can we eliminate this hideous phenomenon! Do not put your lifes and the lifes of your families at risk for the sake of dubious profit!
I might as well warn you: I'm having a crappy day as always... No booze. I expect everyone to do their job right, otherwise heads will roll.
Just warning you: today is even worse than yesterday... The booze I found yesterday is gone and I have nothing left to drink. Some heads are about to roll today...!
Listen all! Today has been the shittiest day of my crappy life! I'm not even going to warn you! You know it all by heart anyway...
I've not felt this bad for a whole week! Beware, everyone!
What a shit day! If I hear just one sound from you, I'll gun you down, you hear me?!
Holy moly, just think how many commanders have popped up so far, eh? Three? Six? Or was it ten already? Is anybody even counting...?
What was I saying...? Hic... Burp... Bring him to me right now! Or you'll regret it, you bums!
Who is making a market around there? I'm on my way... I'm on my way! I'm gonna rip your heads off!
Shit! Everywhere you look, it's shit! Shit and idiots!
Up and running, soldier!
What are you staring at?! Want me to rip off your head?!
Move your ass, soldier!
Have you got crazy over there, or what?!
Who's banging around there, eh? Let me come down and give you a good hammering!
Ah, crap! I'm a sitting duck here!\nJust what am I waiting for, eh? Ah, well...
Turn this stinking thing off! My head is going to explode!
Hic... Burp... Ah, that done well, this one...
Now! Put your weapon down!
Hold it!
Freeze!
And don't move!
Throw your weapon away!
[siren]
[door opening]
[door creeking]
[door closing]
[door locked]
[grenade explosion!]
Put your weapon away!
[laughter]
[zombie attack]
[guitar music]
[laughter]
Put your weapon away!
[laughter]
[zombie attack]
[guitar music]
[laughter]
Come over here, we need to talk.
Guys, I'm sending someone your way, so wing it. You may attack if necessary. Over!
All right, Wolf, send him in. As long as he stays out of the way... Out!
We'll see, punk! If this hideout story is a lie, you're dead meat! I'm gonna roast you over an open fire!
But it's true, I swear, it's no joking matter...!
He's been gone for quite a while now.
Well, he may have been stopped by a patrol or something...
Oh, shut up...!
Man, if you lie to us, you'll be wishing you were dead...
I didn't lie to you, honest!
I'm so itching to take you out...!
But I've told you the whole truth! This is serious!
You'll listen to me! If you set our pal up, I'm going to waste you.
No, no, I didn't!
Move on! Charge! Hammer those bastards!
Don't fall behind!
Don't run too far off!
Keep close together! Don't scatter like cockroaches!
Men, Wolf has sent us some support along with the order to attack. Time to move on and be heroes!
We tore them to pieces!
I've got a pack of dogs on my tail. Help me deal with them and then I can answer all your questions.
Whew! We're done with those mutants.
Pipe down, man! Let me fill you in!
Wolf, factory cleared! Returning to starting positions. Out!
Hey! Anybody alive? Do I still have to sit here? Can I get out of here?
Hello...? You guys still alive? What the heck is going on?
Stalkers, I'm right here! Help me!
Man, what a day...! Damn, is somebody going to save me, or what...?!
I owe you, brother. I could never thank you enough.
What are you standing there for, stalker?! If you want to go through, come up and we'll have a chat! If not, I suggest you take off before we get angry...
Help me, brother! Take the medkit off the stiff. I can't reach it.
Help me, brother! Take the medkit off the stiff. I can't crawl that far!
Thank you, Marked One! You're okay, you know that? I'll be sure to tell everyone at the camp that you helped me out.
Hey, Marked one! Get your ass over here, we need to talk!
Take up your positions! Let's wait for the enemy! Stay alert!
Yeah...! If you're still alive, on me! Marked One, get over here, we need to talk!
Look at these dumbasses! Man, I can't watch this without cringing. Damn!
Come over here! Let me tell you about the situation.
What are you standing there for? Come closer! I don't bite...
Where are you going without a weapon, retard?!
Hey, come over here! I'll give you a few things.
Good hunting, stalker!
Sidorovich greets me

So, Marked One, I saved you and I'm not going to pretend I did it to win favors upstairs. You do some jobs for me... and we're even. 
 
 Besides, keeping you busy might be a good way to deal with your amnesia. And I'll see what I can find out about your problem. 
 
 I don't give a shit why you want to find this Strelok guy, I mind my own business. If you want to kill him, well... You must have your reasons.
So, Marked One, I saved you and I'm not going to pretend I did it to win favors upstairs. You do some jobs for me... and we're even.
Besides, keeping you busy might be a good way to deal with your amnesia. And I'll see what I can find out about your problem.
I don't give a shit why you want to find this Strelok guy, I mind my own business. If you want to kill him, well... You must have your reasons.
Sidorovich about Strelok

Okay... So, I learned a few things about Strelok. He was a stalker. They say he found a way to the northern part of the Zone. 
 
 I'd love to know how he got there... 'Coz those parts are virgin and rich with artifacts. Anyway... Me and the other traders will help you find him... 
 
 And then maybe you'll find that hidden path. It'll be good for all of us. You'll finish Strelok and we'll explore the way up North. It sure is risky as hell, but... As they say, no pain, no gain...
Well, hello there!
So, you're back!
You got the loot...?
Got anything valuable?
What have you got here...?
How is it going, stalker?
Go on, get out of my sight!
Not bad! Some pretty good stuff you got there!
All right! Well, drop by if you get any more!
That's my boy! You made my day!
Now that's the way to go!
Well, good hunting, stalker!
Ah, man! Dog food is more valuable than this!
What the heck are you bringing me in all this crap for?!
What is this shit?!
Did I not make myself clear?! I need real stuff!
[distant gunfire]
[door unlocked]

Commander, some idiot's walking around down there, should we light him up? \n%c[255,240,217,182]Negative. There's no point wasting ammunition on such little things.%c[default] \nHehe, understood. He lives for now.
Anyone who can hear me! We've been attacked by a gang of bandits, we need help! Brothers, help us, we're in deep shit! Bandits have gone mad, is there anyone nearby, damn it?! We're dead meat!
Prepare to die, you son of a bitch!
You'll be shitting through your nose, punk!
You're toast, creep! Come out!
Don't let him get away!
Come out, you piece of shit!
Piss off, you stinking hero wannabe!
Just mind your own business, stalker!
Your cash and your artifacts, and quick, you asshole!
Don't you get it, retard?!
Hand it over, or we'll blow your head off!
It's the bandits! Help!
Hey, guys, I've got nothing...!
I've got no money... No artifacts!
I don't have anything! Don't shoot!
Thanks, friend. I owe you one.
Buzz off, stalker! We don't let every loser go through.
Coming! They're coming!
Good job, guys, take your positions!
Move on, boys! Let's open a can of whoopass on these bastards!
Help us fight off this scum first, brother. We'll talk later.
[distant gunfire]
So...
Meeting Doctor

Strelok! Hey, Strelok! 
 
 Strelok, c'mon, man, wake up! 
 
 Ah, 'tis better. You had me worried. What the hell are you doing, man? Have you lost your memory or something? You were the one who suggested that we take this precaution. 
 
 Oh, well, at least you're... At least you're still alive. Look, Strelok, we've got no time so I need you to listen to me. 
 
 Everything you've said about the Monolith is true. All of it! It is just an illusion manufactured in a lab next to the Sarcophagus. And nobody... Nobody who've reached the Monolith has ever come back. 
 
 It looks like they've died there. 
 
 But anyway... While you were away, I dug up some more info. And, basically, there's a decoder to open the door which leads to the Monolith controls. And this decoder is hidden in a stash in Pripyat. 
 
 Now I'm going to give you the coordinates of this stash, and I'm giving you the key to open it. 
 
 I want you to take the decoder, and I want you to find the door in the Sarcophagus. And then you... Well, you'll know what to do. 
 
 But it seems that this is the only way of uncovering the Zone's real secret. This is the one you've been trying to work out, Strelok! 
 
 All right, that is all for now. It is time for us to split. I'm going to need to lay low for a while. But I'll be waiting for you, Strelok. 
 
 Good luck, my friend!
Strelok! Hey, Strelok!
Strelok, c'mon, man, wake up!
Ah, 'tis better. You had me worried. What the hell are you doing, man?
Have you lost your memory or something? You were the one who suggested that we take this precaution.
Oh, well, at least you're... At least you're still alive.
Look, Strelok, we've got no time so I need you to listen to me.
Everything you've said about the Monolith is true. All of it!
It is just an illusion manufactured in a lab next to the Sarcophagus.
And nobody... Nobody who've reached the Monolith has ever come back.
It looks like they've died there.
But anyway... While you were away, I dug up some more info.
And, basically, there's a decoder to open the door which leads to the Monolith controls.
And this decoder is hidden in a stash in Pripyat.
Now I'm going to give you the coordinates of this stash, and I'm giving you the key to open it.
I want you to take the decoder, and I want you to find the door in the Sarcophagus.
And then you... Well, you'll know what to do.
But it seems that this is the only way of uncovering the Zone's real secret.
This is the one you've been trying to work out, Strelok!
What should I do? What should I do?!
This stinking Zone! Bastards! Using us to fill every gap! I hate them!
I want to go home! Home!
Don't shoot! Please!
Stalkers, I'm right here! Help me!
Phew! It's quiet here, we can wait for the raid to finish. Seriy told me what you're looking for. It's underground around here somewhere, but I don't know exactly where. Be careful, and good luck!
Thank you, friend, you saved my life! That was too close... The grunts always carry their missions through. We've got to get out of here before the task force arrives. Come on, I'll show you the way.
Help me!
Someone, help!
Guys, help me out! I'm gonna get crushed real soon!
Damn, that's a military air assault force! Our guys are there!
Hey! The military are about to destroy Mole's group! We need help!
Let's go, guys!
Let's go. Now!
Please welcome two fresh pieces of meat to the arena! One of them will become dogfood today... Literally... Let's start!
Release the dogs! We have one looser down.
New fight! Two contestants for a place six feet under. Both went through from the first trial. Show us what you've learned! Go!
Medic, medic! Oh, well, he's beyond help now... Butcher!
Baptism of fire for our new fighter, the stalker called Marked One. Today we will find out whether he's a real challenger or still a piece of meat.
Those two guys didn't stand a chance.
The show today is bandits robbing rookie stalkers. Playing the part of rookies are Marked One and his fellow meat.
Even a scythe meets a stone from time to time.
Today we have a special fight. Guests from the mighty OMON will try to detain the amazing Marked One. Go, show them what you're made of!
The military representatives have departed.
Today only! Crime and punishment! The amazing Marked One plays the role of mighty vigilante delivering justice to six criminals and felons. Let the games begin!
Justice is served! None of those six were destined to become free.

The fight for a place is a fight to the death. The amazing Marked One against the Master but there's been a last minute change. Look at the Marked One's confused expression: he had no idea... so a knife against an FT200M. Go, go go!
I can't believe it! He did it! Yet more proof that it's not about the weapon it's about how good you are in using it.

Ladies and gentlemen! Today and today only: the fight for the title of Arena Master! Five finalists, who got to the final through pools of blood and sweat. Each fends for himself, no rules, let the best man win! Go!
Hail the new Arena Master, the one and only Marked One! You really earned this title!
Come on, come on! Waste him!
Waste him! Waste the bastard!
Careful!
Shoot him in the face!
Finish him! Finish him!
Look at that! Just look at what he's doing!
Keep moving, damn it! Don't stand still!
Come on, bro, stab him in the face, go on!
Flank him! Flank him!
Hey...! Marked One!
What's up? How goes it?
Still alive? That's great!
How's it going?
What's up man?
What took you so long?
Come on... Get over here!
What are you standing around for? Get over here!
Get over here, we haven't got much time!
Damn... Drunk again...
What to do...? What the hell should I do?
One more drink...
Come here. I've always got something interesting for people like you.
My information might well be of use to you, stalker...
Damn it...!
Damn it, if only someone helped me...!
Damn.
How did I manage that...?
Why did I bother...?
Talk to the boss, I'm busy!
Talk to the boss!
Stop! Outsiders may not enter!
Stop! This area is closed to outsiders!
Get out of here, stalker!
Hmm... So they'll take the bait and then we'll...
We let the anarchists get away with too much. Yea...
Time to sort this out!
Naturally, the boys are tired, but we can't relax.
Yes.
Yea.
Right. Better take that on board.
They won't wait.
Hello, brother! Why have you come?
What are you, deaf? Why are you here?
Come over here then!
What are you after?
Damn. Same thing day after day...
When is all this going to end?
Man... I guess that's fate.
Let's drink to him once more! He was a good stalker.
Man, that was a bad raid...
Piss off...!
Leave me alone! Life is bad enough!
Hey...
Do you respect me?
Hey...
The summer rains...
Black raven, black raven, circling above the grave...
You can't help but to take a booze with this life. Just want to forget everything...
Damn. Same thing day after day...
When is all this going to end?
Man... I guess that's fate.
Let's drink to him once more! He was a good stalker.
Man, that was a bad raid...
Piss off...!
Leave me alone! Life is bad enough!
Hey...
Do you respect me?
Hey...
The summer rains...
Black raven, black raven, circling above the grave...
You can't help but to take a booze with this life. Just want to forget everything...
I said, come in! Don't stand there...
You can't go there!
Talk to Barkeep!
Stop! You can't go there now!
Come in. Barkeep is waiting.
Come in, come in!
Attention stalkers! We need volunteers for dangerous but well payed missions. Come to the bar if you're interested.
Stalkers! If you're looking for a place to rest, eat, drink, talk or finding some work, the 100 Rads bar is the place for you. We're always happy to serve new customers.
Chernobyl veterans! Join Duty! We have a huge responsibility to protect the world from the expanding Zone!
Free stalkers! Veterans and others! Join Duty! Protecting the world from the Zone's evil is our common goal!
Attention! The enemy has infiltrated out territory! To everyone in the area: destroy the enemy immediately!
Cease fire! Firing is forbidden on Duty territory! Offenders will be punished!
Attention! Marked One broke the law by firing and will be killed!
Attention! A murderer is present! To everyone on Duty territory: kill the murderer immediately!
Attention stalkers! We need volunteers for dangerous but well payed missions. Come to the bar if you're interested.
Stalkers! If you're looking for a place to rest, eat, drink, talk or finding some work, the 100 Rads bar is the place for you. We're always happy to serve new customers.
Chernobyl veterans! Join Duty! We have a huge responsibility to protect the world from the expanding Zone!
Free stalkers! Veterans and others! Join Duty! Protecting the world from the Zone's evil is our common goal!
Stalker! Protect the world from the Zone! Join Duty!
The world fears the Zone's expansion. Join Duty and save the innocent!
Deadly anomalies, dangerous mutants, anarchists and bandits! None of them will stop Duty on it's triumphant march towards saving the planet!
[megaphone music]
[megaphone music]
[megaphone music]
Please, please, don't kill me! Your partner is being taken to the abandoned factory. That's all I know, I swear.
Brothers, help me!
Bullet! Thanks, friend. Hell, I already kissed my life goodbye...
Thanks, bro.
Ah, damn it! Duh! Now, you rest in peace, brother...
You will soon work as a dinner for mutants.
Prepare for a buffet table, dude. You - the basic dish.
Move your legs!
Move more quickly, you ugly creature!
I do not envy you.
Feeling all right? Then we'll going back to the base for help.
Talk, you son of a bitch, or watch my bullet blow your brains out!
Hey, man, come up here! Help us grab our friend from these bastards!
There's no time! Move it!
Well, it's up to you.
Follow me, I know a good place for an ambush. I'll thank you for your help. At Duty, we always pay our debts.
Hide on the other side of the road. They'll be here soon. Open fire only after I do.
Thank this stalker. He's the one who helped me.
They're coming... And here we go!
Okay, scum, you can live... Just don't let me see you ever again!
Come over! We'll talk.
Over here...! Help!
Help me!
Someone, help!
Guys, help me out! I'm gonna get crushed real soon!
Hey, stalker, help me out! Open the door of this damn cell! The controls are on the wall.
Thanks bro, you really helped me!
Piss off, while you're still alive!
Yo, ombre! Come over here and let's talk business!

Listen to me carefully, sucker! If you heard the story of Robin Hood, what about George the Fair? Well, your money went to feed the poor, forget about it. Try sticking your nose here again, and you'll be crawling back to your mommy.
Let's gather! Borov has told to take this blockhead to the old factory.
Yes. And I have an idea.
Get in the pit, asshole!
As you wish...
That solves all problems. No man, no problem. We'll tell Boar that we delivered the prisoner as requested.
He's really pissing me off. This is the third time in a week.
Ssh! Did you hear that?! Man, I have a bad feeling about this! I don't want to leave the camp!
Guys, please let me go, don't do this! I'll give you money! I'll give you everything!
No, I won't jump there, even if you shoot me!

Borov became really impudent! I came from the Zone, was tired. But he, the son of a bitch, sent me to patrol the camp. But who will risk to make the way here? No, I'd better go to sleep. No reason to stay here!
Teams One and Two, check the first floor! Team Three, the main hall! Teams Four and Five, second floor!

Base, this is Zero-Three-Four. We're right above the target. 
%c[255,240,217,182]Roger. Start the action!%c[default] 
Zero-Three-Two, drop your men onto the roof! Do you read me? 
%c[255,216,186,140]Zero-Three-Two, roger. On the roof it is.%c[default]
Are they following us?! Marked One, you must stop them!
Marked One! Marked One, stop them! They'll kill us all!
Stalker, I'm begging you! We were returning from Yantar when the mercs shot down our helicopter. I heard that they're looking for information but I know they will kill us!
Whatever you say, Marked One. But you go first and I'll follow you. I'm a third grade fighter, so you'd better field the ground yourself.
We're safe, finally. Thank you for your help. I owe you one, so, here, take this flashdrive. These are the results of our last expedition. I'm sure Barkeep will pay you well for this stuff.
If you come to our mobile lab in Yantar, we'll give you a real scientist suit.
Ambush... Ambush!
Hurry up, before anyone gets here!

Marked One, there's a Burner anomaly ahead in the tunnel. We better split up and go one by one, that will give us a better chance to survive. You go first, and when I see you've reached the end of the tunnel, I'll follow. Beware of the fire traps, and look out for hot air distortions!
Wolfhound, let's get to it! The Duty are not going to sit around and wait forever. They'll be sure to come and help Kruglov.
But we've got almost no time left!
All right, attack right after we killed the guards!
Wait! I don't want to waste some of my own. Destroy the chopper's security squad, and we'll proceed afterwards.
Good going, we'll make it... We've got to make it!
Wolfhound, I didn't get it. Did he knock off our snipers all by himself?
Roger, on it.
I see Kruglov at the construction site. Let's go get him!
Wolfhound, we've got visitors! Some stalker is coming right at us. What do we do?
Roger, on it.
He's right below us! Shoot through the floor!
There's a stalker closing in on you. Looks like he's gunned down all our snipers. Watch out, he's coming from the Bar!
Yes, sent a couple of guys to cover your asses.
Don't you know what to do with witnesses? Finish him! And make no fuss.
What's going on there, what's all this shooting? Anyone hear me?!
Respond, damn it, what is going on?!
Damn!
Ghost in X-16
Wait a minute, let me do the metering, and we'll move on.
Wait... Wait! Okay, now, let me see... What?!
We've got to get out of here, quick...
I've got the measurements, now we just need to get back to the bunker.
Here are the results. Here, here, and here... Couldn't be any more accurate.
I don't give a shit. I'm not going anywhere alone.
Okay, okay... Little off the scale, but the radiation is normal. We need to move on.
Hmm... The detector seems to have gone off scale. Marked One, we need to get deeper inside, I can't make out anything in here.
Shit! Imminent blowout! Run, Marked One! Hell is about to break loose!
Let's see...
What have we here...?
Damn, not again...!
Hello, hello...!
Just a second... I'm coming.
You're the only person who can go, you've got to understand! It's highly important that we do the measurements now!
I'm begging you, please, do it! We all depend on it!
All right, let me adjust the prototype.

Attention! Power unit 12-01 power supply console code-locked. Report to security officer.
 Unlock operating units.
 Unlock operating units.
 Unlock operating units.
Unit C-12 unlocked. Report to security officer.
Unit C-17 unlocked. Report to security officer.
Unit C-23 unlocked. Report to security officer.
Door locked by a code.
Fang, we can't just leave him like that!
Just leave him, there is nothing we can do for him. The blowout is minutes away and we won't get through with him.
No, Fang, I'm not leaving him!
Where the hell are you, Strelok? Damn!
And Doc's gone, I could really do with a help right now. When I get back from the mission, I'm gonna find the guy at the perimeter. He goes there a lot... And he may help me find Doc.

And if Strelok's still alive, Doc will know for sure where to find him. Anyway, that's for later. And now, I'm all alone, on this stinking underground mission. Vasiliev doesn't count, he's just a burden which I have to protect.
Vasiliev lost it at the very last moment, and when the door opened, he ran off instead of deactivating the lower consoles.
I shouldn't have relied on him. Strelok was right to mistrust those lying dogs. My only chance is to get to the door before the Controller.
...we've got all the papers. We know how to deactivate the source of the emission. Proceeding to dig into the lab with Ghost. Zombies coming out of everywhere...
...it's all screwed up! Ghost has gone insane! He must have been affected by the emissions! I've dropped everything! Trying to get out through the tunnels...
...I'm at the swamp, but where's the bunker? Shit, shit, shit! I can't make out my whereabouts. No response from Sakharov. What's going on?! ...zombies everywhere! I'm running out of the ammo!...
Shit, it's an ambush! Traitor, get out, quick!
Hey, stalker! I've got a job for a good shooter. Come up if interested... Or piss off...
Death to the enemy! Let's get 'em!
It's about time we got to whack someone...
Are we going to shoot any sweethearts this time...?
Just why does it happen at the wrong time, eh?
Just don't shit yourselves...!
Look at that...! Fresh cannon fodder... Just kidding.
It's about time we got some exercise, huh? Not much to do but drink vodka, these days.
Buzz off!
Stay away, or I'll kill you!
I'm insane, I belong in an asylum!
Surrender? I'll burn in hell first!
Done with these baddies.
Got what they deserved. Stinking anarchists.
Oh, yeah. They're done.
What are you staring at, scumbag?! Don't you worry, I'm going to get you sooner or later.
Hush! Quiet, man!
Move on, folks, the way is clear!
Boys, hold buckled up, blast off in a second.
Look alive, gentlemen! It's showtime!
Following the plan, for Duty!
Watch out, an anomaly!
Watch your step!
And at the base the men are drinking vodka...
Check your guns and ammo, just in case.
How... I hate... to run...!
Over. Silence, circle out!
Hey, hey...! Hey! Hold, stalker! You're on Freedom territory.
Halt! Regular checkup, don't shit your pants.
Halt, damn it! Wanna get shot or something?
Everybody, halt! And no fooling around here!
Ho! And halt!
Maaan...! Did we kick some military ass...?!
I was just starting to warm up.
Sissies...
And we only outnumbered them by one...
Okay, folks, time to go home and celebrate!
We're sure. No one's ever watching the rear except Kolyan.
Come up here! Let's have a little chat.
Kolyan, you and your squad will try and cut behind them!
All right, Tolik, take Baldy and Squint. Cover the right flank.
I think I'm going to take a piss.
Number one. \nSee two targets. Sniper on the roof. Shooter in a window. \n%c[255,240,217,182]Four, Five, get busy!%c[default]
Number two, get Three, Four and Five and move left around the barracks. The rest, follow me! \n%c[255,240,217,182]Roger!%c[default] \nNumber three, watch the towers! Four, Five, cover me!
Right through the fireplace, behind the grate. He's yours, Four. Bandit down.
Approaching house. Six, cover! Everyone, follow me.
Watch out, Number One. There's a watcher in the tower!
Three wearing exoskeleton straight ahead! Unit Five, blast away at the barrels!
One, passed the yard, going toward you, over! \n%c[255,240,217,182]Number Two, roger.%c[default]
Entering the building. Eight, check the staircase! Got one, son of a bitch!
Three's down!
Five... Five... Shit! Number Five down!
One's down. This is Number Two, assuming command.
They killed Slovka... Bastards! Bastards, bastards! \n%c[255,240,217,182]Number Seven, get a grip on yourself!%c[default]
Chief, we've got to get out of here! There are more of them than we thought. \n%c[255,240,217,182]Stay calm, proceed with the mission.%c[default]
Yeah...
Sniper down!
Great bump! Go on!
Target neutralized, mission complete. Fall back, everyone, fall back!
Max!
Roger.
We have a problem at the farmstead. Get the boys!
Copy that.
All clear. You can approach.
Anyone following you?
No tail. I'm not a snot-faced rookie or something.
We're moving in.
Well, Pavlusha, what have you got this time?
The info is solid. Here's the folder.
Let's see...
Attention! Critical emissions! Leave the area immediately!
Attention! Protection deactivated.
Irregular situation. Secure immediately. \nFirst floor, second floor, main hall. \nEliminate the trespassers. Suppress the intrusion.

Base, this is Zero-Five-Six. Absence of radiation confirmed. No large enemy groups detected. Scrufa landed in the antennae area for reconnaissance. Standing by for further instructions. Over. 
%c[255,216,186,140]Zero-Six-Five, this is base. Return home! Scrufa, report!%c[default] 
%c[255,240,217,182]Base, this is Scrufa. Minimal resistance. Someone has been here before us.%c[default] 
%c[255,216,186,140]Scrufa, implement quarantine procedures in the antennae area! Eliminate quarantine violators on sight.%c[default] 
%c[255,240,217,182]Base, roger.%c[default]

Attention, Freedom squad! The commander of Duty taskforce speaking. I command you to turn around, and get the hell out of here! You have no business in this sector of the Zone. \n%c[255,240,217,182]Well, get them! What are you, playing a commander here? Now we'll show you who should piss off!%c[default] \n%c[255,240,217,182]Men, let's kick their asses!%c[default]
Marked One, come here! We need to talk!

Gentlemen, listen closely! We're going to push forward to the station. The town is swarming with Monolith bastards and other scum, so keep your eyes open, and cover your backs. That's it. Check your guns. We'll advance along the lane, stand by, fifteen seconds.
You must be the Marked One. Barkeep spoke of you. Let's try and break through together, I know the path to the station.
Go!
Marked One, follow your instincts. Good luck to you!
Ha-ha! Perfect!
Argh...! I'll kill that twat right now!
Nooo...! Lex...!
All right, according to the map, we've got to turn right. There's a safe underground passage.
Gunflash, top left!
Freaks to the right!
Take cover! They're in the windows!
Gunflash, left side, roof!
Roof, to the right!
Eat this, you son of a bitch!
Targets, on the roof to the left!
Windows, left and right!
Right, balcony and window!
One on the roof to the right!
Left!
To the right, behind the pipes!
Take this, shithead!
Yeah...!
Got one!
Ha-ha! Next?
Minus one.
Awesome!
Bullseye!
Look who's here, the grunts. Trying to get to the center first to skim all the cream. Guess what! We'll soon going to be there too! Move it, guys!
Underground car park. We must be right in the center of Pripyat. Keep quiet, Monolith headquarters are close by. Move on, we're about to make it to the station.
Ambush, get them!
Fall back! Fall back, there's too many of them! Retreat!
Kolya, regroup and advance!
That was a bit of a mauling.
Move on, boys!
Move, move!
Forward!
Cease fire! Keep going!
Marked One?! What the hell...?!
What you want is here, stalker. Come!
Your path ends here. Come to me!
Only one can be rewarded.
Whatever you wish, it will be granted. Come to me!
The time has come. I see your wish.
The path has ended, human. Come to me!
Come to me! You will gain what you deserve.
What you want is here, stalker. Come!
Your path ends here. Come to me!
Only one can be rewarded.
Whatever you wish, it will be granted. Come to me!
The time has come. I see your wish.
The path has ended, human. Come to me!
Come to me! You will gain what you deserve.
What you want is here, stalker. Come!
Your path ends here. Come to me!
Only one can be rewarded.
Whatever you wish, it will be granted. Come to me!
The time has come. I see your wish.
The path has ended, human. Come to me!
Come to me! You will gain what you deserve.
Emergency! Not enough power to maintain operative status.
Attention! Power units damaged! Installation power level's falling.
Attention! Installation's power depleted to critical level!
Monolith stand-by power circuit activated. Monolith power supply switched to C-Consciousness Lab.
